name: Dolis
description:
Monsters roam around the open field mindlessly attacking anyone on their sight. You are an adventurer whose job is to fight monsters.

---

Dolis is a 2d RPG about fighting monsters, collecting materials and earning gold for upgrades. Use a sword to attack enemies on the ground, a shield to stun enemies and a bow to shoot enemies that are flying.

---

This game is currently in development, their is still a lot of systems I want to implement to make this game more challenging and fun. Please consider donating a dollar as this will help me finish the game. You can also donate at https://ko-fi.com/solidrgames.

This is my first game with no experience to coding and I'm still not sure if their is bugs.  Please send a report if their is any.

---

- Controls -----------------------------------------------

> Keyboard

Q - Switch to Sword

W - Switch to Shield

E - Switch to Bow

1 - Use an item you set as shortcut in the inventory
